thread.title: Tara Galloway

author: Tara Galloway
title: Tara Galloway
text: ez Cater has been my go-to for reasonably priced, detailed catering. The caterer I have worked with twice now is always reasonable and kind, going above and beyond to help accommodate allergies, large groups, tough locations, and several special requests. ez Cater has also been great about getting me my order discounts and ensuring that I was satisfied. The follow up is fantastic, and the website is clear, concise, and helpful. I'm always very pleased.
